faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our hardware products

0.question: When will the hardware products be released?
0.answer: MeetingMind Mic is scheduled for Q2 2024, and MeetingMind Pod for Q3 2024. Pre-order to be the first to receive launch notifications.

1.question: Are they compatible with existing meeting software?
1.answer: Yes, they're fully compatible with all major video conferencing platforms including Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Webex. Plug-and-play ready without additional driver installation.

2.question: How long does the battery last?
2.answer: MeetingMind Pod offers up to 20 hours, and MeetingMind Mic up to 12 hours of continuous use. Smart power saving automatically minimizes power consumption when not in use.

3.question: Can I cancel my pre-order?
3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your pre-order anytime before launch. No cancellation fees or penalties - simply cancel with one email.

finalCta.title: Experience the Future of Meetings
finalCta.subtitle: Start smarter meetings with MeetingMind hardware

pricing.title: Fair pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing policy that all teams can use, regardless of size

faq.title: Have any
faq.subtitle: We've compiled the most frequently asked questions

items.question: How accurate is the transcription?
items.answer: MeetingMind boasts high accuracy of over 95%. Through deep learning-based speech recognition technology and speaker separation technology, we provide accurate transcription even in complex meeting environments.

items.question: Which languages are supported?
items.answer: We currently support 12 languages including Korean, English, Japanese, and Chinese, and we're continuously expanding language support. Automatic language recognition is also available for multilingual meetings.

items.question: Is team sharing secure?
items.answer: Yes, it's very secure. All data is protected through AES-256 encryption, and we comply with GDPR and SOC2 security standards. Team member access control is also available.

items.question: When am I billed?
items.answer: Pro plans are billed monthly or yearly on a subscription basis. After the first payment, you'll be automatically billed on the same date each month, and you can cancel anytime.

items.question: What are the limitations of the free plan?
items.answer: The free plan supports up to 5 meetings per month, with a maximum of 30 minutes per meeting. Basic summary features are provided, but advanced AI analysis and team sharing features are available in the Pro plan.

items.question: How can I get customer support?
items.answer: Pro plan users get 24/7 priority support. Support is available via email, chat, and video calls, with an average response time of within 1 hour.

support.title: Need more help?
support.description: Feel free to contact us anytime. Our dedicated team will help you.

items.question: How do I start a free trial?
items.answer: You can start a free trial immediately after signing up on the website. No credit card information is required.

items.question: How do I purchase an enterprise plan?
items.answer: Enterprise plans are provided with customized quotes after consultation with our sales team. Leave your contact information and we'll contact you within 24 hours.

items.question: Is on-site training available?
items.answer: Yes, we provide on-site training services for enterprise customers. We conduct customized training programs according to team size and requirements.

items.question: Is API integration possible?
items.answer: We support real-time integration through RESTful API and WebSocket. We provide developer documentation and SDK for easy integration.
